rows.label: qst300405_msg001
rows.name: 傭兵ドライバーバトル後

rows.label: qst300405_msg0001
rows.name:
Ughhh...
You don't even understand that
you're in the wrong here, do you?

rows.label: qst300405_msg0002
rows.name:
Restoring the glory of Envia is the
only way to create a brighter future
for the people of Gula!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0003
rows.name: The glory...of Envia?

rows.label: qst300405_msg0004
rows.name:
That's right! The noble House of Envia,
a proud line unjustly cut short!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0005
rows.name:
Those who bear the blood of Hannes,
Lord of Envia, are the rightful heirs
to the throne of Invidia!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0006
rows.name:
Envia... Hannes...
You speak of the War of Succession.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0029
rows.name:
The War of Succession?
I feel like I've heard of that...

rows.label: qst300405_msg0007
rows.name:
It was a struggle between the noble
houses of Invidia, which occurred
around the nation's inception.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0008
rows.name:
Though only six noble houses currently
hold political power in Invidia...

rows.label: qst300405_msg0009
rows.name:
There were once a full nine noble lines
vying for the throne.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0010
rows.name:
The House of Envia was foremost
among them, and a powerful rival
to the House of Selosia.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0011
rows.name:
But Hannes, the leader of the House
of Envia, was not blessed with an heir
who could carry on his legacy.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0012
rows.name:
There were claims that he had a secret
child somewhere in Gula, but they
ultimately amounted to nothing.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0013
rows.name:
Thus the House of Selosia claimed
the throne, and the present Kingdom
of Invidia took shape.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0014
rows.name:
You know your stuff, I'll give you that...
But the heir of Hannes did exist!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0015
rows.name:
And his bloodline lives on in
Gula to this day!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0016
rows.name:
I see... So you wish to entrust the
Jeweled Signet to this supposed heir
and begin the War of Succession anew.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0030
rows.name: What?! We can't let that happen!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0017
rows.name:
Regardless of your motivations,
I'm afraid we will be taking that Signet.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0018
rows.name:
I don't have it here.
And I'm not telling you where it is.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0031
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0019
rows.name:
If Superbia learns of this potential
conflict, Invidia will fall into disarray.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0020
rows.name:
The effects of this unrest will doubtless
extend to Gula, and to this city,
with its Superbian military installation.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0021
rows.name:
That's not true! He promised there
wouldn't be any adverse-

rows.label: qst300405_msg0022
rows.name: ...Go on.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0023
rows.name:
I...it's a guy from the Divine Beast battleship.
The one stationed at the Torigo Base.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0024
rows.name: I don't know his name...

rows.label: qst300405_msg0025
rows.name:
He said if we brought him the Signet,
the heir of Hannes would become King
and unite Invidia and Gula as one!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0026
rows.name:
A fanciful notion. Even if they have
truly uncovered an heir, I doubt they
could so much as prove his legitimacy.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0027
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Urgh...!
Damn it all!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0028
rows.name:
We must take that Signet back
before it reaches the Empire.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0032
rows.name: Yeah... Let's go!
